posts.post_content:
Totally awesome card! Art, flavor text, *instant speed*.   
  
Restore Balance, anyone? Oblivion Ring your win condition? Greater Gargadon: for sure! Heck, this card even has synergy with Sandbar Crocodile and Taniwha!  
  
So many ways to abuse this, I love it!

posts.post_content:
Completely unplayable.  
  
This could possibly find use with a mana cost of ![0](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=0&type=symbol), but with that insanity of an additional cost, a mana cost of ![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) makes this lifeloss of 5 just a ridiculous bad trade.  
  
Even with only one part of the additional cost - *either* discarding your hand *or* sacrificing all permanents you control - i couldn't think of a good use for this card. at most with hellbent or madness effects...

Posted By: Arachibutyrophobia (7/26/2009 10:32:31 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Fun with Kokusho. Swing for five, sac for five, then they lose five = 15dmg dealt and you gain five life. Instant speed, good finisher to just hang around until you need it. Plus the wording says, *loses* 5 life, that means it cant be prevented or redirected.
  
   
Also, it makes me laugh when I play it knowing I'm losing next turn anyways.
posts.html:
Fun with Kokusho. Swing for five, sac for five, then they lose five = 15dmg dealt and you gain five life. Instant speed, good finisher to just hang around until you need it. Plus the wording says, loses 5 life, that means it cant be prevented or redirected.

Also, it makes me laugh when I play it knowing I'm losing next turn anyways.
Report Abuse  
Posted By: Gilgamesh3000 (7/27/2009 3:28:03 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I don't know why this is rated so low, the effect is really quite good as a finisher. And it's not like you can't float mana, resolve this, and cast more, not that I would ever do that since this should be a finisher period. I mean, 1/4th of your life total is hardly anything to sneeze at, especially when it's *lose* life not take 5 damage, at instant speed even.  
  
Try it in a Suicide Black deck sometime and you'll see what I'm talking about. And as for it getting countered, that's why it would be in Suicide Black, so you can protect it with [Duress](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Duress) or [Thoughtseize](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thoughtseize).

Posted By: ArashikageClan (7/31/2009 11:35:04 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This card should not be rated so low. One possible combo is this and [Hive Mind](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hive Mind). Everyone discards their hand and sacs all their permanents. If you have [Grip of Chaos](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grip of Chaos) out, then no one gets to choose who takes the damage!
